title: Pack executor
description: Packages a VS Code extension into a VSIX with curated node_modules and optional extraction.

targetPath.description: Workspace-relative or absolute path to the extension root.

targetName.description: Nx project name of the extension if targetPath is not provided.

outputPath.description: Directory for output VSIX (defaults to config.json vsix-package-output).

keepDeploy.description: Keep staged deploy directory after packaging (defaults from config.json persistent).

deployPath.description: Base directory for deploy staging (defaults to config.json).

freshDeploy.description: Clean previous deploy for this package (defaults from config.json overwrite).

extractContents.description: Extract VSIX contents after packaging (defaults from config.json).

contentsPath.description: Directory to extract VSIX contents to (defaults to config.json).

dev.description: Build a dev VSIX (adds -dev suffix and version with NX_TASK_HASH).
